version_description:
- New game mode: Infection
- Commendations are now available
- Scoring system have been improved for King of the Hill, CTF and Oddball
- 6 New emblems have been added to the shop
- Bugfixes and other improvements

- NEW: Red vs Blue game mode
- Every weapons are available from the drop-pods
- 5 min per games
- Maps have been improved
- New commendation available: Backup
- New controls buttons
- Bugfixes and other improvements

- New button: Weapon Switch
- New game modes
- New achievements
- New scoring system for King of the Hill, CTF and Oddball
- Red vs Blue gives more points per victory
- Weapons improvements
- AI improvement
- Bugfixes and other improvements

- Bugfixes and other improvements

- New weapon: DMR

- New Helmet: Noble 1
- New game map

- Bugfixes and other improvements

- New enemies in Firefight

- Fix the new iOS achievements
- Bugfixes and other improvements

- NEW: 12 missions to complete!
- NEW: 3 levels of difficulty
- Enemies drop ammunitions
- AI improvements
- New achievements

Clans are coming in Spartan Firefight! Create and manage your own Clan or join an existing Clan.
Team up with other players to increase the experience of your Clan and unlock bonuses for all your members!
